LightningComponentBundle.description: This component allows the user to configure and display a datatable in a Flow screen.

propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: Object API Name
propertyType.description: Select the API Name of the SObject to use in the Datatable

property.name: tableData
property.label: _ Datatable Record Collection
property.description: REQUIRED: Record Collection variable containing the records to display in the datatable.

property.name: preSelectedRows
property.label: Pre-Selected Rows
property.description: Record Collection variable containing the records to show as pre-selected in the datatable.

property.name: outputSelectedRows
property.label: Output Selected Rows
property.description: Record Collection variable to contain only the records that were selected in the datatable. -- NOTE: These records may not contain all of the edited values.

property.name: outputEditedRows
property.label: Output Edited Rows
property.description: Record Collection variable to contain only the records that were edited in the datatable. -- NOTE: To write these edits back to the Object, you will need to do a Record Update in the Flow.

property.name: columnFields
property.label: _ Column Fields
property.description: REQUIRED: Comma separated list of field API Names to display in the datatable.

property.name: columnAlignments
property.label: - Column Alignments (Col#:alignment,...)
property.description: Comma separated list of ColID:Alignment Value (left,center,right). -- NOTE: ColIDs can be either the column number or the field API Name

property.name: columnEdits
property.label: - Column Edits (Col#:true,...) or All
property.description: 'All' or a Comma separated list of ColID:True or False -- NOTE: Some data types cannot be edited in a datable (lookup, picklist, location, encrypted, rich text, long text area) -- NOTE: ColIDs can be either the column number or the field API Name

property.name: columnFilters
property.label: - Column Filters (Col#:true,...) or All
property.description: 'All' or a Comma separated list of ColID:True or False -- NOTE: Some data types cannot be filtered in a datable (location, encrypted) -- NOTE: ColIDs can be either the column number or the field API Name

property.name: columnIcons
property.label: - Column Icons (Col#:icon,...)
property.description: Comma separated list of ColID:Icon Identifier -- EXAMPLE: 1:standard:account (Display the first column with the Account icon) -- NOTE: ColIDs can be either the column number or the field API Name

property.name: columnLabels
property.label: - Column Labels (Col#:label,...)
property.description: Comma separated list of ColID:Label (These are only needed if you want a label that is different from the field's defined label) -- NOTE: ColIDs can be either the column number or the field API Name

property.name: columnWidths
property.label: - Column Widths (Col#:width,...)
property.description: Comma separated list of ColID:Width (in pixels). -- NOTE: ColIDs can be either the column number or the field API Name

property.name: columnCellAttribs
property.label: . Special: Column CellAttributes (Col#:{name:value,...};...) Use ; as separator
property.description: EXAMPLE: FancyField__c:{class: 'slds-theme_shade slds-theme_alert-texture', iconName: {fieldName: IconValue__c}, iconPosition: left}

property.name: columnOtherAttribs
property.label: . Special: Column Other Attributes (Col#:{name:value,...};...) Use ; as separator
property.description: EXAMPLE: Description:{wrapText: true, wrapTextMaxLines: 5}

property.name: columnTypeAttribs
property.label: . Special: Column TypeAttributes (Col#:{name:value,...};...) Use ; as separator
property.description: EXAMPLE: DateField__c:{year:'numeric', day:'2-digit', month:'long'}; NumberField__c:{minimumFractionDigits:4}

property.name: hideCheckboxColumn
property.label: Hide Checkbox Column?
property.description: Set to True to hide the row selection column. -- NOTE: The checkbox column will always display when inline editing is enabled.

property.name: keyField
property.label: Key Field
property.description: This is normally the Id field, but you can specify a different field if all field values are unique.

property.name: matchCaseOnFilters
property.label: Match Case on Column Filters?
property.description: Set to True is you want to force an exact match on case for column filter values.

property.name: maxNumberOfRows
property.label: Maximum Number of Records to Display
property.description: Enter a number here if you want to restrict how many rows will be displayed in the datatable.

property.name: singleRowSelection
property.label: Single Row Selection (Radio Buttons)?
property.description: When set to True, Radio Buttons will be displayed and only a single row can be selected. The default (False) will display Checkboxes and allow multiple records to be selected.

property.name: suppressBottomBar
property.label: Suppress Cancel/Save Buttons during Edit Mode?
property.description: Cancel/Save buttons will appear by default at the very bottom of the table once a field is edited. When hiding these buttons, field updates will be applied as soon as the user Tabs out or selects a different field.
